name: Shane Daniels
description:
Shane Daniels is a full-service digital agency that believes the paradigm of traditional communication has collapsed. In a connected world where consumers are active agents, the interruption model and mass media monologue is no longer efficient. Consumers, increasingly better informed, want real involvement and relationship with brands, companies, and institutions.
Our team is formed by Web Designers, Developers, Graphic Designers, Digital Marketing Managers, as well as professionals from Commercial and Administrative areas. This is the connected and dynamic world that Shane Daniels operates, offering management of digital presence with excellence. After all, the society has changed and communication must change as well.
READ MORE...
